name: You brought a shield to a tentacle fight
name_original: You brought a shield to a tentacle fight
description:
This is a game where you use your only tool, a shield, to survive in a hell of bullets.

Also you cant move.. cause you are an egg...

Controls:
[Mouse/Touch] to aim your shield

Brought to you by:

  • Digitalfudge - Art
  • Maksim Loboda - Programming
  • Lev Kamenskyi - Design
  • Maxime Audfray - Music and SFX
